ABOUT US.

Eyram's Kitchen is a vibrant restaurant founded by GIGI Kanari.
Our menu changes daily, showcasing a delightful array of seasonal and locally sourced dishes.
When you visit us, check out our pantry to see our vinegars, pickles, and brines.
We offer two unique dining experiences.
The first is our curated menu featuring small plates, pastas, and desserts designed for sharing.
Guests can also enjoy small bites served from our roaming carts during their meal.

Time: 9 AM to 5 PM.

Tel: +233(0) 551410712
